TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebEventCustomEvaluator

summary.span: 计算是否将某个事件发送给相关的提供程序以进行处理。

span.span: Evaluates whether an event should be sent to the related provider for processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，可以管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含有助于管理运行状况事件的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 此接口允许启用或禁用特定事件的激发。This interface allows enabling or disabling the firing of a specific event. 实现自定义事件，并且想要控制从该处发送到相关的提供程序进行处理的速率时，这是特别有用。This is especially useful when you implement your own custom event and want to control the rate at which it is sent to the related provider for processing. > [!NOTE] > 此接口不控制引发该事件的频率。This interface does not control how often the event is raised. 它仅控制何种频率的事件信息被发送到提供程序进行处理。It only controls how often the event information is sent to the provider for processing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生接口创建自定义事件时。The following code example shows how to derive from the interface when creating a custom event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#1)] 下面是配置文件，它使 ASP.NET 使用一段摘录方法来决定是否必须处理发送到提供程序引发的事件。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use the method to decide whether the raised event must be sent to the provider for processing. ``` ```

related.span: ASP.NET 运行状况监视概述

summary.span: 计算是否应该引发某个事件。

span.span: Evaluates whether an event should be raised.

returns.span: 如果应引发该事件则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if the event should be raised; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果自定义事件计算器返回`true`，引发并由关联的提供程序然后处理该事件。If the custom event evaluator returns `true`, the event is raised and then processed by the associated provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的自定义实现方法。The following code example shows a custom implementation of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#22)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#22)]
